subject: Implement 6-agent parallel analysis (Phase 2 - Expanded)
description:
Create analyze_innovations.py to spawn 6 specialized agents (not 3): ResearchAgent, CodeAgent, DependencyAgent, CrossProjectAgent, PackageAgent, MetaVengineAgent. Implement ACE consensus with 6-agent DQ-weighted voting. Perform topological sort for dependency ordering (which projects must update first). Target: 15-30 findings per run with multi-target support.

Success criteria:
- 15-30 findings per run
- 5-10 cross-project synergies detected
- DQ scores >0.7
- Valid dependency roadmap (no circular dependencies)
- Cost: <$4/day

Files to create:
- ~/researchgravity/orchestrator/analyze_innovations.py (~600 lines)
- ~/researchgravity/orchestrator/dependency_graph.py (~200 lines)
